meta_title: What Is Capital? Industrial Definition & Maintenance Guide
meta_description: Capital represents the physical and financial assets used in production. This guide defines capital for maintenance managers focusing on CapEx and asset ROI.
title: Capital Definition: An Industrial Maintenance Perspective

image_prompt: A high-angle, wide-angle shot of a clean, modern manufacturing floor in 2026. A diverse group of three engineers in high-visibility vests and hard hats are reviewing a digital tablet near a large, complex robotic assembly line. The environment is brightly lit with natural light, featuring cinematic industrial photography that emphasizes scale and technological sophistication. No text.
